cause.description:
this project is an effort to bring mr. oliveria to florida, once and for all. enough of the excuses and work hubbub. it's going to happen...whether i have to have that fat with a beard kidnap him or not.
1. geoff should come visit NOW.
2. operation FL>VA/GA is a cause, regardless what others think.
3. geoff misses florida, and the people who live there, of course.
cause.name: operation FL>VA/GA
